ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
> > One thing that I would like added for bards, but I don't know
> > if other's
> > would want it, is a button we could toggle between 'Group'
> > and 'All'.
>
>I would have to agree with you. It always seemed silly to me that only
>people in my group were able to hear my songs.
>
>But.. on the other hand, if the songs affect everyone that can hear them,
>then they would logically affect the mobs you're fighting as well. And
>think
>of all the complaining that would arrise from Bards being able to
>mana-lessly heal and buff other players just by standing next to them.

For a short time in beta this was the case. It was great when I would come
upon a party in trouble I could buff/heal them with ease. Also people would
always be hitching a ride on the Selo Train as I would cross the Karanas. I
was saddened when they took this out.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
